body_html: @vade In the mean time make sure you are compiling with AVX or AVX2 as that makes a big difference. I hope to publish some info on the performance page soon. I just got an email back from Intel and I believe they are interested in helping us work through it. Sadly the dream of just swapping out the download was not the solution. :-) In some ways I am not sure why I thought it would be that easy....nothing is that easy.

body: @vade In the mean time make sure you are compiling with AVX or AVX2 as that makes a big difference.  I hope to publish some info on the performance page soon.  I just got an email back from Intel and I believe they are interested in helping us work through it.  Sadly the dream of just swapping out the download was not the solution.  :-)  In some ways I am not sure why I thought it would be that easy....nothing is that easy.
